title: Product of Cosine and Sine
text: The formula to express the product of cosine and sine as a sum or difference is 1/2[sin(a+b)-sin(a-b)].

title: Identify Unknown Angles

title: Identify Unknown Angles

title: Using Formula to Solve
text: To solve, plug in the values for a and $$b$$ into the formula. The initial coefficient of $$10$$ becomes $$5$$ when multiplied by the $$\frac{1}{2}$$.
